content: Roosevelt River at Isla Novo Destino, an island which splits and shapes the river and is the site of river rapids, experienced by Theodore Roosevelt and his team while exploring the river in 1914. (“River of Doubt” by Candice Millard, 2005)__no.0584, 2020. #RooseveltRiver #RioTeodoro #Brazil #TeddyRoosevelt #Riverofdoubt
